```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

require(sqldf)

setwd(".")
```

## Load the datasets

```{r cars}
mop <-read.csv("../results/mop.csv", head=T, sep=",")
colnames(mop)


# filter the mop dataset to compare only Cipher and MessageDigest

mop <- sqldf("select * from mop where spec in ('CipherSpec', 'MessageDigestSpec')")

sqldf("select count(*), count(distinct className) from mop")

cl <- read.csv("../results/crylogger.csv", head=T, sep=",")

colnames(cl)

sqldf("select count(*), count(distinct className) from cl")

sqldf("select className from cl where className not in (select className from mop)")

sqldf("select className from mop where className not in (select className from cl)")

```
